_readme: WoW-verified terminology for this addon's locales. Terms are confirmed by native speakers or in-game inspection — do NOT rely on dictionary translations for WoW-specific terms. Read this entire file before editing any locale.
_how_to_use: 2. Use the EXACT terms listed — never substitute with dictionary equivalents.
3. Read ALL '_notes' entries for your locale before writing any text. Notes override everything else.
4. Locales are INDEPENDENT — do not assume a term from one locale carries over to another. esES and esMX look similar but differ on key terms (e.g. Crests).
5. Crest tier keys (3383, 3341, etc.) are Blizzard tier IDs — always match by ID, not by list position.

_format_rules.CRITICAL_no_unicode_escapes_in_lua: Lua does NOT support \uXXXX unicode escape sequences. ALWAYS write literal UTF-8 characters in .lua files. NEVER write \u0420-style escapes — write the actual character (e.g. Р, not \u0420). Applies to every string, title, and text field in every *_Data.lua file.
_format_rules.utf8_files: All .lua files must be saved as UTF-8. Accented Latin (e.g. ã, ö, é), Cyrillic, and all other non-ASCII characters must be written as literal characters, not escaped.
_format_rules.json_vs_lua: \uXXXX escapes are valid inside this .json context file, but are INVALID in Lua. Never copy JSON-escaped text into .lua files without decoding it first.

_notes.Crests: USE: Écu (singular), Écus (plural). Full name pattern: 'Écu de l'aube [tier]'. IMPORTANT: Hero tier uses adjective 'héroïque' (NOT 'de héros'); Mythic uses 'mythique'. Do NOT use 'Crête/Crêtes'.
_notes.Delves: USE: Gouffres (same for singular and plural). Do NOT use 'Plongées' or 'Expéditions'.
_notes.Sparks: USE: Étincelle de radiance (singular), Étincelles de radiance (plural).
_notes.Great Vault: USE: 'Grande Chambre Forte'. Do NOT use 'Grand Coffre'.

_notes.Crests: USE: Wappen (coat of arms). Do NOT use 'Zinnen' (battlements) — common mistranslation. Full name pattern: 'Morgenlichtwappen des [tier]' (genitive). Hero tier = 'des Helden', Mythic tier = 'der Mythen' (plural genitive).
_notes.Great Vault: USE: 'Große Schatzkammer' (full name). Do NOT abbreviate to 'Gewölbe' in UI text.
_notes.Raid: USE: 'Schlachtzug' in formal UI text — Blizzard's official DE term. 'Raid' is widely understood but non-standard.

_notes.Crests: Blasones (heraldic term). Do NOT use 'Crestas'. Full names: 'Blasón del alba de [tier]'. Note: esMX uses a completely different word 'Crestalborada' — these are separate localizations.
_notes.Raid: 'Banda' is the WoW ES term for Raid (instance). The verb is 'raidear'. Raid leader = 'líder de banda'.
_notes.Warmode: USE: 'Modo guerra' (lowercase 'guerra' as Blizzard UI commonly does).

_notes.Crests: CRITICAL: esMX uses 'Crestalborada' (singular) / 'Crestalboradas' (plural). This is completely different from esES 'Blasones'. Do NOT use 'Blasones' for esMX. Full names: 'Crestalborada de [tier]'. Note: Mythic tier uses adjective form 'mítica' (not 'de mito' like esES).

Emblema (m.) singular, Emblemi plural. Do NOT use 'Cresta/creste'. Full names: 'Emblema dell'Alba dell'[tier]' / 'del [tier]'. Tier names are masculine nouns/titles (Avventuriero, Veterano, Campione, Eroe, Mito).
_notes.Delves: Scorribande (feminine). Do NOT use 'Profondà' or 'Spedizioni'. Bountiful Delves = Scorribande generose.
_notes.Great Vault: Grande Forziere. Do NOT use 'Grande Volta'.

_notes.Crests: Brasão (m.) singular, Brasões plural. Do NOT use 'Crista/cristas'. Full names: 'Brasão Auroral do [tier]'. Mythic tier = 'Mítico' (adjective, not noun like other tiers).
_notes.Delves: Imersões (feminine). Do NOT use 'Profundezas' or 'Expedições'. Bountiful Delves = Imersões abundantes.

_notes.Sparks: CONFIRMED via Wowhead KO (currency 3212): full name '빛나는 불꽃 가루'. TRACKING_SPARKS_LABEL uses short form '불꽃:' — confirmed by PR contributor (native KR WoW player dingoh).
_notes.Crests: CONFIRMED: '문장' (heraldic crest). Confirmed by PR #13 from native speaker.
_notes.Delves: CONFIRMED: '구렁' (NOT '잠행' — that was wrong). Confirmed throughout PR #13 data file: '구렁 8단', '구렁 11단', '구렁 탐험가의 은혜'.
_notes.Bountiful Delves: CONFIRMED: '풍요로운 구렁'. Confirmed in ILVLREF_SEC_DELVES = '풍요로운 구렁 아이템 레벨'.
_notes.Renown: CONFIRMED: '영예' (NOT '명성'). Confirmed throughout PR data: '영예를 위해', '영예 작업', '영예 획득'.
_notes.World Boss: CONFIRMED: '필드보스' (field boss, NOT '월드 보스'). Confirmed in PR data: '필드보스 킬'.
_notes.Crest tiers [3341]: CONFIRMED: '노련가' (NOT '베테랑'). Native Korean WoW term for veteran tier.
_notes.Crest tiers [3343]: CONFIRMED: '챔피언' (NOT '용사'). Transliteration is used, not native word.
_notes.Raid display vs formal: KR uses '레이드' as casual display label (TRACKING_GV_RAID, section headers) but '공격대' in formal context (공격대 찾기 = LFR). Do NOT mix them.

_notes.Great Vault: USE: Великое хранилище (neuter). Genitive: 'Великого хранилища'. хранилище = repository/storage place, which correctly conveys 'vault'. Do NOT use 'Великий тайник' — тайник means a secret hiding place/cache, which is semantically wrong.
_notes.Crests: USE: Герб (singular), Гербы (plural), Гербов (genitive plural). Do NOT use 'Гребень/Гребни'. Tier names confirmed by human translator: [3343] Защитник (Champion), [3347] Эпохи (Gilded). Mythic/Gilded gear track label = 'Легенды'; gilded crest short label = 'Эпохи' (of the Epoch).
_notes.Prey: Event name: USE 'Охота' (Hunt). EXCEPTION: the label key TRACKING_QUEST_WEEKLY_PREY keeps its value 'Еженедельная добыча' (generic weekly loot); only item body text uses 'событие Охота'.
_notes.Silvermoon: USE: 'Двор Луносвета' (Court of Silvermoon — WoW RU official). Do NOT use literal 'Серебряный Город'.
